title.narrative: GEF SGP Fifth Operational Phase - Implementing the Program Using STAR Resources II

description.narrative:
Conservation of Globally Significant Biodiversity Through Community-based Initiatives and Actions,Reduction or Avoidance of GHG Emissions While Building Climate Resilience at the Community-level,Reverse and Prevent Desertification/Land Degradation and Mitigate the Effects of Drought in Affected Areas Through Community-based Initiatives and Actions,Sustainable Management of Transboundary Water Bodies at the Community-level
,Reduce and Eliminate the Release of Harmful Chemicals into the Environment Through Community-based Initiatives and Actions
